seniority_level.evidence: 1-5 years of professional software development experience and 1+ years of data engineering experience aligns with mid-level expectations

sub_specialty.evidence: Role involves designing interfaces, dashboards, and managing data logic/lineage, which are typical of data warehouse applications; Palantir Foundry is a data integration and warehouse platform
